import React from 'react' import { Card, CustomInput } from 'reactstrap'; import { ContextMenuTrigger } from 'react-contextmenu'; import { Colxx } from '../../../../components/common/CustomBootstrap'; function CategoryListHeading({selectedItemsLength,handleChangeSelectAll,itemsLength, orderBy, orderManner, changeOrderBy}) { const arrow = orderManner.value=== 'ASC' ? `iconsminds-arrow-up-3` : `iconsminds-arrow-down-3` const defaultIcon = `iconsminds-scroller` return (
= itemsLength} onChange={() => handleChangeSelectAll(true)} />

Id

) } export default CategoryListHeading
